sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const CartPage = () => { const [cartItems] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Product 1', price: 19.99, quantity: 2 }, { id: 2, name: 'Product 2', price: 29.99, quantity: 1 }, ]); const calculateTotal = () => { return cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price * item.quantity, 0); }; return (

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

) : (
{cartItems.map((item) => (

{item.name}

${item.price.toFixed(2)}

{item.quantity}
))}
)}

Order Summary

Subtotal ${calculateTotal().toFixed(2)}
Shipping Free
Total ${calculateTotal().toFixed(2)}
); }; export default CartPage;
